participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Liam is introspective and enjoys expressing himself through his style. He has a laid-back demeanor and appreciates the simplicity of non-GMO foods.
participant_1.background: Favorite band is Red Hot Chili Peppers. I love dark clothes. I love cold weather. I work two jobs as a cashier. I love non-GMO foods.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is quirky and a bit of a dreamer. She often finds herself caught between familial expectations and her own aspirations.
participant_2.background: My sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when I am getting married. I still have a photo from my senior prom in my wallet. I often think about quitting my job and becoming a roadie for Justin Bieber. I own five pairs of the same pants. I am not a big fan of waiting in line.
